profile.name: Gustavo Fring
profile.currentTitle: Owner & CEO, Los Pollos Hermanos / Madrigal Electromotive
profile.headline: Built a multi-state restaurant chain and parallel distribution network spanning international borders, achieving 99.1% product quality standards while maintaining zero compliance incidents across the legitimate operation.
profile.executiveSummary: Visionary operator who built Los Pollos Hermanos from a single location into a multi-state fast food operation while simultaneously constructing a vertically integrated distribution network spanning three countries. Known for exceptional quality control, process optimization, and an ability to manage complex multi-stakeholder relationships across legitimate and non-traditional business channels.
